attributes.action: enforce legislation which would ensure victims of anti-social behaviour are treated fairly and taken seriously by all local authorities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The commitment to dealing with anti-social behaviour and nuisance neighbours is variable between local authorities. many victims are not treated in an appropriate manner or are ignored. We call on the government to set standard legislation which would ensure that all cases are treated seriously, fairly and promptly.
